title: Australian diary. No. 071
creator_credit: Jack S. Allan and Australian National Film Board
brief_description: The following items are featured in this interesting cinemagazine: ant hills in the north of the continent are a natural mystery; aa flying padre ministers to a congregation spread over a vast area; Fulbright scholars extend their knowledge of Australia and the art of making a humble broom is shown.
